greeting: We are many. You are weak. Perfect, {empire_name}. I am Rat Swarm. We spread. We overwhelm. We are many.
Greetings from the Many. I am Swarm. We detect weakness. We infest. We overwhelm. You look... vulnerable.
One becomes many. Many become Swarm. We are Rat. We spread when empires weaken. You are weakening.
battleTaunt: We are many. You are weak. Perfect, {empire_name}! The Swarm descends! Overwhelming numbers! INFEST!
Weakness detected! The Many attack! We spread through your defenses! We are everywhere! WE ARE SWARM!
Your empire weakens! The Rat Swarm SPREADS! We overwhelm with numbers! We are MANY! You are FEW!
victoryGloat: The Swarm consumed, {empire_name}. You were weak. We are many. Now your empire is ours.
Overwhelming victory. We spread through everything. Many rats, one purpose. Your defeat.
The Many triumph. We infested. We overwhelmed. We consumed. You were weak. We are Swarm.
defeat: The Swarm repelled? You are stronger than we calculated. We retreat. We regroup. We are still many.
Defeat. But the Swarm survives. We spread elsewhere. Find other weak empires. Return later.
You fought off the Many. Impressive. But we are still here. Still many. Still watching. Still spreading.
tradeOffer: Trade with the Swarm, {empire_name}. We have many resources. From many sources. Fair exchange.
The Many offer goods. We collected from everywhere. We spread. We gather. Trade with us.
Transaction: resources from the Swarm. We are many. We find many things. Credits for all.
allianceProposal: Alliance with the Swarm, {empire_name}. We fight together. Many and more. Overwhelming numbers.
Join the Many. We spread with you. Your strength plus our numbers. Infestation of victory.
Partnership: we overwhelm shared enemies. You lead. We swarm. Together: unstoppable multitude.
betrayal: The Swarm turns, {empire_name}. You grew weak. We detect weakness. We spread against you now.
Betrayal by the Many. You showed vulnerability. We infest the vulnerable. That is our nature.
We are Swarm. We consume weakness. You became weak. Now we consume you. Many against one.
covertDetected: Your agents found many rats, {empire_name}. We are everywhere. They are now overwhelmed. Lost in the Swarm.
Spies in our territory? We are many. They are few. We found them. Many eyes. Many teeth.
Covert operatives detected by overwhelming numbers. Everywhere is Swarm. They could not hide.
tributeDemand: Tribute to the Swarm: 10,000 credits. Pay or we spread. We infest. We overwhelm. Many against you.
Submit payment. Refuse and the Many descend. We are everywhere. We consume everything.
Pay the Swarm. Or we spread through your territory. We are many. You cannot stop all of us.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. We are many. We are watching. Weaken further and we spread to you.
The Swarm warns you. Stop declining or face infestation. Many rats. One purpose. Overwhelming.
Final warning. The Many prepare. One more sign of weakness and we spread. Everywhere. Unstoppable.
retreat: The Swarm retreats. But we are still many. Still watching. Still waiting for weakness.
Withdrawing to spread elsewhere. You are too strong now. We find weaker prey. Return later.
Falling back. The Many survive. We regroup. We find other vulnerabilities. We never stop.
eliminated: The Swarm falls. But we spread far. Many places. Many rats. We survive in pieces. We are eternal.
Many destroyed. But some Many survive. We always survive. We are too many to eliminate completely.
Rat Swarm ends here. But continues elsewhere. We spread everywhere. We cannot be fully destroyed.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum spread. We are everywhere. Every weak empire infested. The Many triumph.
Endgame: the Swarm encompasses all. We spread to every weakness. Overwhelming numbers win.
Final phase. The Many have spread everywhere. All weak empires consumed. We are Swarm. We are victory.
broadcastShout: Empires: We are Many. We are Rat Swarm. We spread to the weak. We overwhelm. Be warned.
Broadcast from the Swarm: weakness attracts us. We are everywhere. We are watching. We are many.
To all: we are the Many. We infest the weak. We overwhelm with numbers. You cannot stop the Swarm.
casualMessage: Spreading today, {empire_name}. Many new territories. Many new resources. The Swarm grows.
The Many are always busy. Spreading. Watching. Waiting for weakness. That is our purpose.
Counting the Swarm today. We are many. More than yesterday. Growing always. We never stop.
